description.narrative: This transaction comprises the equivalent USD 1m (+1m limit) senior unsecured debt in LCY to Thitsar Ooyin to support the institution in its future loan growth plans. Thitsar Ooyin provides loans to clients, about 74% women, in poor and remote areas of the Myanmar, a low income country. Proceeds of loans are for livestock, production and services and the rest is for cultivation.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Netherlands
